comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: There are dates top left 10/12/14 is one, I can't quite make out the other two.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Retired at last:

Thanks for the comment. After flipping the digital image to make it easier to read, I'd say the first date is either 10/14/14 or 10/16/14 and the second date is 12/6/30.  We've speculated that some of the negatives have been marked with later dates indicating they were published again on those dates.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Looks like the same person as this Raymond Benjamin in an article from 1924 freepages.genealogy.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~npmelton/sfbbe... There is a skimpy Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_Benjamin NYT of July 14, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20A11FB385A12738... says that he was elected Grand Exalted Ruler of the Benevolent and Protective Order of Elks.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85066387/1912-03-10/ed-... The San Francisco call., March 10, 1912, Page 62, Image 62 has a 1912 picture of him, which could well be the same guy.
